details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.8.3 Artefacts - Standard roles
details.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in PDF Reference 9.7.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root.

rule.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root.

error.message: Non-standard structure type is not mapped to a standard type
